metadata.title: CVE-2017-17555 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: The swri_audio_convert function in audioconvert.c in FFmpeg libswresample through 3.0.101, as used in FFmpeg 3.4.1, aubio 0.4.6, and other products, allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (NULL pointer dereference and application crash) via a crafted audio file.

criterions.comment: aubio package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.4.6-2').
